data: {"generalSituation":"A fresh to strong easterly airstream will affect the coast of Guangdong tomorrow. A cold front is expected to move across the coast of southern China later on Saturday. Winds will strengthen from the north with one or two rain patches over the region. Temperatures will fall appreciably. Under the influence of the associated northeast monsoon, the weather will be dry over the coast of Guangdong early next week. It will be cool in the morning and at night, with a relatively large temperature difference between day and night over inland areas. With the monsoon moderating, the weather will improve over the coastal areas of southern China with temperatures rising gradually midweek next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251212","week":"Friday","forecastWind":"East force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 offshore and on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy.
